thread.title: Enaxis Consulting Expands into Dallas-Ft. Worth Market
thread.title_full: Enaxis Consulting Expands into Dallas-Ft. Worth Market

author: Media Relations
title: Enaxis Consulting Expands into Dallas-Ft. Worth Market
text:
Enaxis Consulting, a leading Management and Technology consulting firm, today announced that the company will be expanding into the Dallas-Ft. Worth market to accommodate growing client demand for the firms services in those areas. Enaxis Consulting has traditionally served the Houston area market while the company’s new offices in Dallas will provide more convenient access for locally based clients, employees, and future job candidates. “We are extremely excited about our expansion into Dallas-Ft. Worth, a highly strategic location,” says Dhiren Shethia, Co-Founder and Managing Partner. “With Dallas being a top-ten U.S. market, this expansion is key to widening the geographic and vertical reach of our firm’s services.”
To drive this expansion, Enaxis Consulting has appointed DFW-based David Trowbridge as its new Director. Trowbridge joins the firm from Unisys, Alsbridge, and CSC, and will take the lead in building and maintaining new business relationships with his extensive consulting experience. “David will be an invaluable point of contact for our Dallas based clients,” explains Shethia, “his experience in and understanding the IT consulting industry, and its relation to driving business value will certainly help our clients gain the competitive advantage they’re seeking.”
About Enaxis Consulting
Enaxis Consulting is a specialized consulting firm operating as the trusted advisor to the enterprise IT executive. Our consultants are focused in the business of IT and help minimize the time and cost associated with transformative changes. We offer the quality of a global firm without billing for global-size overhead. We have the ability to successfully leverage client resources by ensuring that every consultant has significant broad experience as well as expertise in specific areas. This approach provides high value to our discerning clients who recognize and appreciate the value we bring to the table. As a result, we take pride in the fact that referrals contribute significantly to our client base of Fortune 500 companies. For more information, visit http://www.enaxisconsulting.com
